channel.title: Stevens County|Washington|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Stevens County|Washington|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-395 South Approaching WA-292
item.description: US-395 South approaching WA-292 to Springdale and Loon Lake.

item.title: US-395 South Approaching WA-231
item.description: US-395 South approaching WA-231 to Valley and Springdale.

item.title: US-395 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-395 south leaving Chewelah. Distance to Jct. WA-231, Loon Lake, and Spokane.

item.title: US-395 South/WA-20 East at US-395/WA-20 Split
item.description: US-395 South/WA-20 East at US-395/WA-20 Split in Colville. Turn left for WA-20 East (3rd Ave.) to Ione and Newport.

item.title: US-395 South/WA-20 East Approaching US-395/WA-20 Split
item.description: US-395 South/WA-20 East approaching US-395/WA-20 split. Use WA-20 East for Newport and Ione.

item.title: US-395 South/WA-20 East - Railroad St. Roundabout
item.description: US-395 South/WA-20 East - Railroad St. Roundabout in Colville. Merge right for Railroad St. south to (Colville) City Center. Merge left to continue on US-395 south, which is incorrectly signed as WA-395.

item.title: US-395 South/WA-20 East - Railroad Street Roundabout
item.description: US-395 South/WA-20 East at Railroad Street Roundabout in Colville.

item.title: US-395 South/WA-20 East - Entering Colville
item.description: Entering Colville on US-395 South/WA-20 East. Colville is the county seat of Stevens County.

item.title: US-395 South/WA-20 East - Kettle Falls
item.description: US-395 South/WA-20 East in Kettle Falls

item.title: WA-25 South at US-395/WA-20
item.description: WA-25 South at US-395/WA-20 near Kettle Falls. Turn right for US-395 North/(WA-20 West) to Grand Forks, BC (Canada). Turn left for US-395 South/(WA-20 East) to Colville.

item.title: WA-25 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance maker on WA-25 south. Distance to Marcus, Kettle Falls, and Davenport. This is the first distance marker on WA-25 south of the US-Canada border.

item.title: WA-25 South - Northport-Waneta Road
item.description: WA-25 South at Northport-Waneta Road. Use Northport-Waneta Road for access to Canada at the Port of Waneta.

item.title: WA-25 South - Welcome to Washington
item.description: Welcome to Washington on WA-25 south. Taken just south of the Port of Frontier border inspection facility.

item.title: WA-25 South - Welcome To The United States
item.description: Welcome To The United States on WA-25 South. Port of Entry at Frontier Washington. Open 24 hours a day. The border facility is in the background.
